alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cascade, or 9 miles west of Colorado Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manitou Springs around 635 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stratmoor, Fort Carson, Cimarron Hills, Peterson AFB and Falcon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for east central Colorado.
